SENSES.SENSE: the way in which you are treated by other people<font color=blue> ex: Disabled people have a raw deal under the current government. </font>
the act of giving cards to the people playing a game of cards<font color=blue> ex: Whose deal is it next? </font>
a formal agreement, especially in business or politics<font color=blue> ex: We think there was a deal between the CIA and the FBI. </font>
an informal arrangement that you have with someone that gives you advantages or disadvantages<font color=blue> ex: I've got a really good deal living at Sophie's house. </font>
what is happening or going to happen<font color=blue> ex: So, what's the deal? Is she coming or not? </font>
wood from fir or pine trees used for making furniture<font color=blue> ex: a set of deal chairs </font>
